sub_title: Policy Officer for International and European Affairs
summary:
MSc Public Policy and Human Development Graduate; United Nations University Merit 🇺🇳 & Maastricht University 🇳🇱, School of Business and Economics.

Young cosmopolitan & dedicated to Europe 🇪🇺. I hold a bachelor’s degree in Political Sciences from the Paris-Lodron University Salzburg 🇦🇹. My practical experiences are shaped by my spirit for European Integration, Economic Development, Human Rights & Communication.

My Schuman Traineeship stood in the light of the inter-institutional campaign of the European Institutions in Brussels and Europe-wide. Therefore, I actively contributed to the citizen’s outreach efforts of the European Parliament in Brussels in the forefront of the EE19 elections such as the communication and organization of the European Parliament’s “Election Night” at the Esplanade Solidarność 1980 as well as certain outreach-events in the city of Brussels. Following points furthermore specify some responsibilities:

▫ coordination of inter-institutional events (Open Days: European elections info-desks)
▫ social media communication of the European Parliament (IG/FB/Twitter)
▫ web editing - development of the EP visitors’ booking system
▫ strategy development for Directorate C
▫ logistics & management of merchandise materials', 'title': 'Schuman Traineeship at the Visitors Services Coordination Unit of the European Parliament', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 18554100, 'name': 'Land Niederösterreich', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQHs5IcN3eY1hA/company-logo_400_400/0/1521821144344?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=bkcEeYompbUs6pvvyWC2DRlcXP1blUM8IgeQ1mHMC1Y', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/land-niederoesterreich/', 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Brussels, Brussels Region, Belgium', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Land Niederösterreich', 'description': 'Office of the State Government of Lower Austria

Erasmus+ Program scholarschip beneficiary

The focus of this Brussels based Traineeship was on cohesion policies and policy coherence in a regional context. In particular, the monitoring of legislative procedures in the areas of transportation infrastructure, economic development, and cohesion fund related initiatives, were among my main tasks. Furthermore, I was directly involved in the planning and operational sphere of official visits of high state representatives to the European Institutions, including media outreach, transfer management and coordination with European Institutions’ officials concerning protocol modalities.', 'title': 'Traineeship at the Brussels Liaison Office of Lower Austria', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Office of the State Government of Tyrol', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Brussels, Brussels Region, Belgium', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Office of the State Government of Tyrol', 'description': 'I found myself in a multicultural and multilingual team reflected the European spirit of the interregional office structure based cooperation and dialogue to optimize synergies of the diversification of the regions. My core tasks compromised reporting about specific civic stakeholder’s panel discussions and committee debates in the European Parliament, administrative tasks such as co-organization of events and respective follow-up communication. Furthermore, I was responsible for the content, format & upload of the weekly newsletter “Tirol in Europa”, using MS Publisher.', 'title': 'Traineeship at the Brussels Liaison Office of the European Region Tyrol - South Tyrol - Trentino', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 79906940, 'name': 'Bundesministerium für europäische und internationale Angelegenheiten (MFA Austria)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFseR9EMx3nZw/company-logo_400_400/0/1670707091640?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=az1rX3LmrshMdDowyMax5OjTOBICRofEwRNF8qKWIWQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/aussenministerium-at/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Geneva, Switzerland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Bundesministerium für europäische und internationale Angelegenheiten (MFA Austria)', 'description': 'Federal Ministry of the Republic of Austria for European and International Affairs

The main tasks included not only attending conferences and briefings, but as well as participating negotiations and internal briefings in the following domains at the multilateral level

▪ Human Rights (HRC)
▪ Refugees (UNHCR)
▪ international health policy (WHO)
▪ disarmement (DC)
▪ protection of intellectual property (IPO)
▪ working conditions (ILO)
▪ meteorology and climate change (WMO)

but also compromised in particular tasks at the 34th Session of the Human Rights Council and its specialized side events, as well as contributing to the improvement of the contents of the mission’s Website, writing technical briefings and reports, developing press screenings for thematic areas such the Austrian supported initiative for the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons (TPNW).', 'title': 'Traineeship at the Permanent Representation of Austria to the United Nations', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}]
